== Value ==

There are 2 variations of this entity:

  * `&Sigma;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/03a3/index.htm U+003A3].
  * `&sigma;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/03c3/index.htm U+003C3].
